name: CVE-2025-24085-Disclosure
description: Formal disclosure of CVE-2025-24085 â€“ a critical zero-click remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability affecting iMessage on iOS 18.2.1 (iPhone 14 Pro Max) and iOS 18.3.1 (iPhone 15 Pro Max). Apple has failed to patch the exploit, instead opting to discontinue affected devices. This repository documents the vulnerability, logs, and PoC.
